alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Livingston Area; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 1:05PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Thunderstorms capable of producing strong wind gusts will impact portions of southwestern Park County through 200 PM MDT... At 103 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Livingston to 9 miles northwest of Divide Lake. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong winds may arrive well ahead of rain or thunder. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Gardiner, Chico Hot Springs, Pine Creek, Chico, Corwin Springs, Emigrant and Jardine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
